resources.string: Chalk Radio is an MIT OpenCourseWare podcast about inspired teaching at MIT. They take you behind the scenes of some of the most interesting courses on campus to talk with the professors who make those courses possible. Their guests open up to us about the passions that drive their cutting-edge research and innovative teaching, sharing stories that are candid, funny, serious, personal, and full of insights. Listening in on these conversations is like being right there in person under the MIT dome, talking with your favorite professors. Hosted by Dr. Sarah Hansen. New episode every other Wednesday, starting February 19, 2020.

To be clear, this app is an open sourced unofficial mobile client for MIT OCW. https://ocw.mit.edu/\n\nIf you have any suggestions, feature request or problems, please visit the project on https://github.com/yashx/OCW and tell me about it. I will try to help as best as I can.

This app is not the official app for MIT OCW and is in no way related or endorsed by them. This is just a project I built on a whim.\n\nIf you have any problem with the course material please understand that I have no control over it, I just show what is on the website in a more user friendly way.
This course has some video content which sometimes is not shown properly in the app. Be sure to check the course in any browser to make sure you are not missing out on anything.
